      • createCachedFile

        public CachedFile createCachedFile(String filename,
                          Bitmap bitmap)
        Creates a file in the cache directory with a given filename. If the external storage is not mounted the internal storage is used as a fallback.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file which is created.
        bitmap - The bitmap represented by the file.
        Returns:
        The cached file.
